title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.260 - Luncheon meat
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.260 - Luncheon meat

State Regulations
"Luncheon Meat" is a cured, cooked meat food product
made from comminuted meat. To facilitate chopping or mixing or to dissolve the
usual curing ingredients, water or ice may be used in the preparation of
luncheon meat in an amount not to exceed three percent of the total
ingredients. Notes

319.260

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
